transmute.name: Orb of Transmutation
transmute.description: Upgrades a normal item to magic rarity with 1-2 random modifiers.
transmute.notes: First step of traditional alteration crafting.

augment.name: Orb of Augmentation
augment.description: Adds a new random modifier to a magic item with an open slot.
augment.notes: Only usable if the item has fewer than 2 mods.

alch.name: Orb of Alchemy
alch.description: Upgrades a normal item to rare with 4-6 random modifiers.
alch.notes: Common entry point for chaos spam on good bases.

regal.name: Regal Orb
regal.description: Upgrades a magic item to rare and adds a new modifier.
regal.notes: Consumes the magic item and creates a rare with 3 mods.

chaos.name: Chaos Orb
chaos.description: Reforges a rare item with new random modifiers.
chaos.notes: Greater/Perfect variants increase weighting towards higher tiers.

exalted.name: Exalted Orb
exalted.description: Adds a new random modifier to a rare item with an open prefix/suffix.
exalted.notes: Cannot be used if the item already has 6 modifiers.

divine.name: Divine Orb
divine.description: Randomises the numeric values of the item's modifiers within their tiers.
divine.notes: Best paired with Hinekora's Lock to secure high rolls.

annul.name: Orb of Annulment
annul.description: Removes a random modifier from a magic or rare item.
annul.notes: Used to free a slot before multi-modding or exalting.

fracturing-orb.name: Fracturing Orb
fracturing-orb.description: Fractures one random modifier, fixing it permanently.
fracturing-orb.notes: Converts the item into a fractured base for safer rerolling.

vaal.name: Vaal Orb
vaal.description: Corrupts the item, applying a powerful effect or bricking it.
vaal.notes: Prevents further crafting except via special corruption benches.

hinekoras-lock.name: Hinekora's Lock
hinekoras-lock.description: Locks in the outcome of the next crafting action, allowing acceptance or rejection.
hinekoras-lock.notes: Consumes on use; typically paired with Divine/Exalted.

chance.name: Orb of Chance
chance.description: Upgrades a normal item to a random rarity (magic/rare/unique).
chance.notes: Used for farming specific uniques when bases are cheap.
